column2: ###### STACKED BAR CHART BY OUTCOME & AGE RANGE
# Removing NAs for age_range and outcome
ggplot(data = filteredData, aes(x = age_range, fill = outcome)) +
labs(title = "Usually no further action after Search across all ages (Sept 2022)",
subtitle = "Insight into age-based differneces in stop-and-search outcomes",
legend.title = element_blank()  # Optionally remove legend title
